quote.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.

Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.

Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.
Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride - and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself.
Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.

Your personal life, your professional life, and your creative life are all intertwined. I went through a few very difficult years where I felt like a failure. But it was actually really important for me to go through that. Struggle, for me, is the most inspirational thing in the world at the end of the day - as long as you treat it that way.
If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.

I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.
You must do the things you think you cannot do.
Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.
Two roads diverged in a wood and I - I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
Keep your feet on the ground, but let your heart soar as high as it will. Refuse to be average or to surrender to the chill of your spiritual environment.
We relish news of our heroes, forgetting that we are extraordinary to somebody too.
The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
Out of difficulties grow miracles.
The power of imagination makes us infinite.
There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
What we think, we become.

If there were no night, we would not appreciate the day, nor could we see the stars and the vastness of the heavens. We must partake of the bitter with the sweet. There is a divine purpose in the adversities we encounter every day. They prepare, they purge, they purify, and thus they bless.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.

When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.
A single sunbeam is enough to drive away many shadows.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others.
When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.

If you always put limit on everything you do, physical or anything else. It will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible.
Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
I thank you God for this most amazing day, for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and for the blue dream of sky and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes.
The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.
Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself.
I believe that if one always looked at the skies, one would end up with wings.
Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
Prayer is man's greatest power!
Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.
A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.
Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.
The things that we love tell us what we are.
What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.
I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life - and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing I wanted to do.
The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
Countless as the sands of the sea are human passions.
Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.
If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.
I dwell in possibility.
With self-discipline most anything is possible.
Every man's life is a fairy tale written by God's fingers.

Once I knew only darkness and stillness... my life was without past or future... but a little word from the fingers of another fell into my hand that clutched at emptiness, and my heart leaped to the rapture of living.
We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
From its brilliancy everything is illuminated.
